title: My Portfolio

user.name: SATISH
user.introduction: Frontend Architect, with 14+ years building and owning scalable shared component libraries and modern web applications. Proven track record of partnering with Product & Design to prototype and deliver accessible, high-performance UI components via CI/CD pipelines (Storybook, Jenkins). Experienced with Node.js and Express for REST APIs and backend integrations, boosting end-to-end delivery speed. Skilled in WCAG-compliant accessibility, React Router/Query, and TDD with Jest, React Testing Library, and Mocha.

description: Built & owned a React+TypeScript shared component library (Storybook-driven) used by 10+ application teams, integrating CI/CD pipelines for automatic releases and versioning.
Partnered with Product & Design in agile sprints to prototype and iterate UI solutions, reducing design-to-dev handoff time by 25%.
Optimized developer experience by authoring TypeScript definitions, example apps, and comprehensive docs—cutting onboarding time by 40%.
Implemented automated testing with Jest & React Testing Library at component level, achieving 95% coverage and preventing regressions.
Optimized Webpack build configurations for faster CI/CD pipelines, reducing deployment time by 40%.
Developed RESTful APIs with Node.js/Express.js, integrating with MongoDB & PostgreSQL, reducing data retrieval time by 35%.
Mentored junior developers on Node.js backend best practices, code reviews, and Express middleware patterns.
Resolved complex frontend challenges through cross-team collaboration, reducing issue resolution time by 40%.
Implemented technologies to address client-specific needs, boosting project efficiency by 20%.
Designed a scalable UI framework, improving user satisfaction by 30% across multiple banking platforms.
Led migration of legacy UI modules to React/TypeScript, integrating React Router & React Query to streamline data fetching and client-side routing, boosting page load performance by 20%.
Engineered accessibility (WCAG 2.1 AA) into all components, performing automated audits (Axe, Lighthouse) and remediating violations.
Developed and deployed user interfaces, enhancing web application functionality and increasing user engagement by 25%.
Conducted technical sessions that helped junior developers increase their debugging efficiency by 30%.
Coordinated team efforts to deliver high-priority projects, achieving a 100% on-time completion rate.
Championed the adoption of technologies through market analysis, cutting project costs by 15%.
Developed, tested, and debugged applications using Groovy, JavaScript, jQuery, HTML, and CSS, improving performance by 20%.
Proposed and implemented improvements aligned with industry standards, resulting in a 15% increase in efficiency.

interest: Apart from being a web developer, I enjoy spending time with my family and friends. I enjoy playing games on PS4, I love watching sci-fi, fantasy, comedy movies and web series, and I spend a large amount of my free time exploring the latest technology advancements in the front-end web development world.
